########## RESOURCES & CODES START HERE ##########
USE THESE CODES AT YOUR OWN RISK!, I am not responsible if any of these codes break your save, as a good practice I always make a backup of my save beforehand every time I apply a cheat.
 
########## DISCLAIMER ##########
The work put into the creation & maintainment of these codes & resources come from some of the following Discord Servers: 
Discord Server List: https://github.com/sterben-Dev10/SaveWizard-Resources
The Author's listed above codes & the Creators & Maintainers

Spreadsheet for ID's: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16pNesZUCFnSW2UQq2DvmfdUQw-ZADhv_t9QkfzbE6sY/edit?pli=1#gid=2024075550
Credits to Lotus#0676 for research & Codes.


[Lotus#0676]
Set Container Quality To 120 [1-1792]
8001000C FFFFFFFF
FFFFFFFF 07000000
4A000010 42F00000
47CF0030 00000000

Set Basket Quality to 120 All Items
8001000C 07000000
D0890100 8E130000
4A000010 42F00000
40630030 00000000

Item Add Template Builder - (This Code Adds stuff to your basket)
-- Starts Here --
8001000C 07000000	
D0890100 8E130000	
92000000 00000YYY <-- YYY = Item Slot
18000000 0000IIII <-- IIII = Item ID
18000002 00000000 
28000004 QQQQQQQQ <-- QQQQ = Quality
18000008 0000TTTT <-- TTTT = Trait 1
1800000A 00000000	
1800000C 0000TTTT <-- TTTT = Trait 2 [input 0000 if you don't need another trait]
1800000E 00000000	
18000010 0000TTTT <-- TTTT = Trait 3 [input 0000 if you don't need another trait]
18000012 00000000	
18000014 0000TTTT <-- TTTT = Trait 4 [input 0000 if you don't need another trait]
18000016 00000000	
18000018 0000TTTT <-- TTTT = Trait 5 [input 0000 if you don't need another trait]
1800001A 00000000	
1800001C 0000EEEE <-- EEEE = Effect 1
1800001E 00000000	
18000020 0000EEEE <-- EEEE = Effect 2 [input 0000 if you don't need another effect]
18000022 00000000	
18000024 0000EEEE <-- EEEE = Effect 3 [input 0000 if you don't need another effect]
18000026 00000000	
18000028 000000UU <-- UU = Item Uses [Consumables & Items Only]
1800002C 00000895	
1800002E 00000000
-- Ends here --

Same code for Simple Copy & Paste
-- Starts Here --
8001000C 07000000	
D0890100 8E130000	
92000000 00000YYY
18000000 0000IIII
18000002 00000000 
28000004 QQQQQQQQ
18000008 0000TTTT
1800000A 00000000	
1800000C 0000TTTT
1800000E 00000000	
18000010 0000TTTT
18000012 00000000	
18000014 0000TTTT
18000016 00000000	
18000018 0000TTTT
1800001A 00000000	
1800001C 0000EEEE
1800001E 00000000	
18000020 0000EEEE
18000022 00000000	
18000024 0000EEEE
18000026 00000000	
18000028 000000UU
1800002C 00000895	
1800002E 00000000
-- Ends here --

Example: Bunny Tail
8001000C 07000000
D0890100 8E130000
92000000 0000000C <-- YYY [00C] Slot 1
18000000 00000080 <-- IIII [0080] Item ID: Bunny Tail
18000002 00000000
28000004 42F00000 <-- QQQQ [42F00000] Quality x120
18000008 00000105 <-- TTTT [0105] Trait 1: Sky Essence
1800000A 00000000
1800000C 00000095 <-- TTTT [0095] Trait 2: Stats Power
1800000E 00000000
1800001C 000000F0 <-- EEEE [00F0] Effect 1: Loot Chance++
1800001E 00000000
18000020 000000F2 <-- EEEE [00F2] Effect 2: Loot Trait Lv++
18000022 00000000
18000024 000000F4 <-- EEEE [00F4] Effect 3: Loot Quality++
18000026 00000000
1800002C 00000895
1800002E 00000000

Slots - Choose One [YYY]
00C	<-- Slot 1
03C	<-- Slot 2
06C	<-- Slot 3
09C	<-- Slot 4
0CC	<-- Slot 5

Quality - Choose One [QQQQ]
42F00000 - 120

Uses - Choose One [UU]	
01 - 1
05 - 5
0A - 10
32 - 50

All Gathering Tools and Magic Tools	- (Yes it's a multiple item code , not reproducable for examples)
